title: Dreams and Tears
content:
Send your dreams where nobody hides
寄送出你的梦，去到无人隐藏之地
Give your tears to the tide
将你的泪水，与潮汐相汇

title: Silent Thoughts
content:
Sometimes the quietest moments speak the loudest truths.
有时，最安静的时刻述说着最响亮的真理。

title: Morning Reflections
content:
The morning light carries yesterday's dreams into today's reality.
晨光将昨日的梦想带入今天的现实。
